summary: An Ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3530 for the improvement of Alley in Block 5, Randell's Addition, being the alley between 35th Avenue and 36th Avenue, extending from East Union Street to East Spring Street; all in the City of Seattle, under Ordinance No. 43627, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
